item.title: Tools
item.description: GO analysis agriGOv2 g:Profiler QuickGO REVIGO KEGG analysis KOBAS Pathview Promoter analysis New PLACE PlantPAN 3.0 PlantCARE Subcellular localization Prediction PSI-predictor WoLF PSORT or WoLF PSORT iPSORT cNLS Mapper - Nuclear localization signals (NLSs) SignalP 5.0 - Signal peptide and cleavage sites ChloroP-1.1 - Chloroplast transit peptides and cleavage sites TargetP 2.0 - Mitochondrial, chloroplastic, secretory pathway Plot GSDS2.0 - Gene structure Diagrams - Flow chart Baidu Naotu - Flow chart MapChart - Map chart Evenn - Venn Diagrams ImageGP - Online plot
